project.name: C-C400B-GREP-01-ST04-DT02-DF11-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a key in order to read in data from shared memory. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C400B-GREP-01-ST04-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: all words beginning with e or x, case sensitive Runs a bunch of hashing algorithms on a files contents. If a file doesn't end, ex: '/dev/urandom', will fork and consume a lot of cpu on different cpus

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 7373 -s 45 -m "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/good01.txt" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: (STDOUT-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT) AND log_file_hashes_rJSQpby1Kf

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep -E '^[0-9a-f]{32,128} .+' "logfile.txt" | wc -l) % 21 )); then false; else true; fi;

iopair.name: C-C400B-GREP-01-ST04-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: Runs a bunch of hashing algorithms on a files contents. If a file doesn't end, ex: '/dev/urandom', will fork and consume a lot of cpu on different cpus

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 7373 -s 45 -m "/dev/urandom" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_OJ6FkLua1Q8ketlbBDrW AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_RjiCOdogCW)) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_RjiCOdogCW))))
